valorantr 0.0.1

    Get player

    get_player.Rd

    Get player info given a player ID

    Usage

    get_player(player_id)

    Arguments

    player_id

    Player ID

    Value

    a list with the following elements

    Examples

    # \donttest{
yay <- get_player(2716)
dplyr::glimpse(yay)
#> List of 18
#>  $ id                   : int 2716
#>  $ ign                  : chr "yay"
#>  $ firstName            : chr "Jaccob "
#>  $ lastName             : chr "Whiteaker"
#>  $ bio                  : chr "Jaccob \"yay\" Whiteaker is an American player who is currently playing for Andbox."
#>  $ countryId            : int 226
#>  $ instagramUrl         : NULL
#>  $ liquipediaUrl        : NULL
#>  $ twitchUrl            : chr "https://www.twitch.tv/yayisreal"
#>  $ twitterUrl           : chr "https://twitter.com/yayFPS"
#>  $ youtubeUrl           : NULL
#>  $ imageUrl             : chr "https://i.imgur.com/831bo4j.webp"
#>  $ firestoreId          : chr "q90rD7XX8VW2aeoaLn9l"
#>  $ previousRiotPlayerIds: chr [1:2] "4qhP3SAGywYPl3UYacEuagImQvGcL9dJLvk34dpxSm4MfHHLmOR8yOY-KkJKKPONEtj9KUMSThIRCA" "c9eNTnnz4i_dsql4LmZ39TenkdTlpgMmW-n2FVWj7vnBA8Pcob84FfqOcPwiqGUaBjVjgIHdRGHlAw"
#>  $ startDate            : chr "2022-02-10T00:00:00.000Z"
#>  $ role                 : chr "player"
#>  $ team                 :List of 17
#>   ..$ id           : int 6426
#>   ..$ name         : chr "OpTic Gaming"
#>   ..$ shortName    : chr "OPTC"
#>   ..$ description  : chr ""
#>   ..$ websiteUrl   : chr "https://opticgaming.gg/"
#>   ..$ logoUrl      : chr "https://i.imgur.com/2nXAtuC.png"
#>   ..$ liquipediaUrl: chr "https://liquipedia.net/valorant/OpTic_Gaming"
#>   ..$ twitterUrl   : chr "https://twitter.com/OpTic"
#>   ..$ twitchUrl    : chr "https://www.twitch.tv/opticgaming"
#>   ..$ vlrUrl       : chr "https://www.vlr.gg/team/8127/optic-gaming"
#>   ..$ youtubeUrl   : chr "https://www.youtube.com/opticcraft"
#>   ..$ foundedDate  : chr "2022-02-10T00:00:00+00:00"
#>   ..$ countryId    : int 226
#>   ..$ regionId     : int 2
#>   ..$ rank         : int 2
#>   ..$ regionRank   : int 1
#>   ..$ aliases      : chr "OpTic"
#>  $ news                 :'data.frame':	22 obs. of  4 variables:
#>   ..$ slug        : chr [1:22] "team-of-the-tournament-valorant-champions-2022" "loud-ends-2022-as-valorant-world-champions" "optic-vs-drx-decides-second-grand-finalist-at-champions-2022" "jovi-departs-from-optic-gaming-frees-up-analyst-position" ...
#>   ..$ title       : chr [1:22] "Team of the Tournament: VALORANT Champions 2022" "LOUD ends 2022 as VALORANT World Champions" "OpTiC vs. DRX decides second Grand Finalist at Champions 2022" "Jovi departs from OpTic Gaming; frees up analyst position" ...
#>   ..$ publishDate : chr [1:22] "2022-09-23T15:00:40" "2022-09-18T20:58:35" "2022-09-17T19:24:41" "2022-07-29T09:38:32" ...
#>   ..$ thumbnailUrl: chr [1:22] "https://old.runitback.gg/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/TFZLu31.webp" "https://old.runitback.gg/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/52366879709_ce0f134e79_k.webp" "https://old.runitback.gg/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/52364392378_e4ed7fa3f5_k.webp" "https://old.runitback.gg/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/optic-1.webp" ...
# }
